documentation.author: Janae Nelson
documentation.purpose: When the clinician documents a domestic concern on the ED Triage Adult, ED Triage Pediatric, Newborn Admission History, NICU Admission History, OB Admission History, Patient History, Patient History ICU or Pediatric Admission History form, a consult order shall be generated to Social Services.
documentation.explanation:
Event to Trigger the Rule * Domestic Concerns of feels unsafe at home or injuries or neglect is documented.
General Criteria to Evaluate * Emergency or Inpatient encounter type
Action If a domestic concern has been documented, the Consult to Social Services order is automatically entered.
Order Comment --Order entered secondary to documenting a domestic concern
documentation.citation:
Patients who may be victims of abuse or neglect are assessed. JCAHO PC.3.10
Development of a plan for care, treatment, and services is individualized and appropriate to the patient's needs, strengths, limitations and goals. JCAHO PC.4.10

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_RESULTA_EVAL_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the triggering request contains a STATUS result for EVENT_SET_NAME that is EVALUATION VALUE1

statements.statement: SELECT IF (PAR1="ALL") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " ELSEIF (PAR1 != "OTHER") from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(n.source_string)=PATSTRING(CONCAT(cnvtupper(PAR1),"*")) ELSE from nomenclature n,code_value cv plan cv where cv.code_set=401 and cv.cdf_meaning ="ALPHA RESPON" join n where n.active_ind=1 and n.principle_type_cd=cv.code_value and n.beg_effective_dt_tm <= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.end_effective_dt_tm >= cnvtdatetime(curdate, curtime3) and n.source_string != " " and CNVTUPPER(substring(1,1,n.source_string)) NOT BETWEEN "0" AND "Z" ENDIF STRING = n.source_string ORDER cnvtupper(n.source_string)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL QUAL DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ENCOUNTER_LOC_DETAIL_L
templateDefinitions.definition: the patient's ENC_DETAIL that QUAL in DETAIL_VALUE for the same encounter as OPT_LINK

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDERS_FIND_L
templateDefinitions.definition: orders exist ORD_METHOD OPT_ORDERS with order status of OPT_ORDER_STATUS on OPT_SCOPE OPT_LINK whose date criteria is OPT_QUAL OPT_TIME_NUM OPT_TIME_UNIT from the anchor OPT_ANCHOR_DT_TM.

column.value: link to other template by the same accession_id
link to other template by the same encounter_id

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_ORDER_NEW
templateDefinitions.definition: Order PROCEDURE PRIORITY and bill code CODE with CHART order comment COMMENT

statements.statement: select ocs.mnemonic,catalog_type=cv.display from order_catalog oc, order_catalog_synonym ocs, code_value cv plan oc where oc.orderable_type_flag not in (2,3,6,8,11) and oc.active_ind = 1 and oc.catalog_type_cd > 0 join cv where cv.code_value = oc.catalog_type_cd and cv.cdf_meaning != "PHARMACY " join ocs where ocs.catalog_cd = oc.catalog_cd and ocs.mnemonic = oc.primary_mnemonic order cnvtupper(ocs.mnemonic)
SELECT C1.DISPLAY_KEY,C1.DESCRIPTION,C1.CODE_VALUE FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE C1.CODE_SET = 2054 AND C1.ACTIVE_IND=1 ORDER C1.DISPLAY_KEY
SELECT C1.DESCRIPTION FROM CODE_VALUE C1 WHERE CODE_SET = 13028 ORDER C1.CODE_VALUE
